plot: Before leaving her cram school, Nanako Misonô asks one of the teachers if they can become pen-pals. The teacher, Takehiko Henmi, is reluctant at first, but eventually accepts the offer. The story is narrated through the letters sent from Nanako as she enters Seiran, a renowned private high school for girls only. There she encounters many difficulties as an ordinary middle-class girl invited to the prestigious Sorority, the most traditional and sophisticated club on campus.
opening_theme: "黄金の器 銀の器 (Kin no Utsuwa, Gin no Utsuwa)" by Satomi Takada
ending_theme: "気まぐれな妖精 (Kimagure na Yousei)" by Takako Noda
